20k per: You provide all ingredients

50k per: you provide rare ingredients

125k: Glittering Glowing Shimmering

150k: Glimmering (10) Brilliant (2) Radiant (4) Shining (10) Sparkling (4)

(#) indicates how many I can make currently with the ingredients I have. Ingredients with the same # overlap, so that would be total of both

However, I only have 12 clear bases left out of 39, so 12 total of anything
